channel.title: S3 on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in S3 on Arrans github.io

item.title: juicedata/juicefs
item.description: JuiceFS is a distributed POSIX file system built on top of Redis and S3.

item.title: seaweedfs/seaweedfs
item.description: SeaweedFS is a fast distributed storage system for blobs, objects, files, and data lake, for billions of files! Blob store has O(1) disk seek, cloud tiering. Filer supports Cloud Drive, xDC replication, Kubernetes, POSIX FUSE mount, S3 API, S3 Gateway, Hadoop, WebDAV, encryption, Erasure Coding. Enterprise version is at seaweedfs.com.

item.title: drakkan/sftpgo
item.description: Full-featured and highly configurable SFTP, HTTP/S, FTP/S and WebDAV server - S3, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob

item.title: siyuan-note/siyuan
item.description: A privacy-first, self-hosted, fully open source personal knowledge management software, written in typescript and golang.

item.title: rclone/rclone
item.description: “rsync for cloud storage” - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

item.title: kurrier-org/kurrier
item.description: Kurrier is a modern, self-hosted workspace for email, calendar, contacts and storage.

item.description: TUI explorer application for Amazon S3 (AWS S3) ðŸª£

item.title: okhosting/awesome-storage
item.description: A curated list of storage open source tools. Backups, redundancy, sharing, distribution, encryption, etc.
